Results.ReviewText: I purchased for $999 & then went down to $799, I was credited $200 by Costco. This sofa is really a great bargain. I don't have kids, 2 small dogs & fits nicely in the room.
Results.Title: Buy this sofa!

Results.ReviewText: I am absolutely in love with this sofa! Its medium size is perfect for my living space, fitting beautifully into my setup without overwhelming the room. The sleek, modern design, soft texture, and neutral tone add a touch of elegance to the living room. (My puppy baby approved it too🥹) Friends who visited yesterday couldn’t stop raving about it and kept asking where I got it. I briefly considered getting two sets since it’s easy to assemble in different configurations but decided one was enough for my cozy apartment. Truly, this is the best sofa I’ve ever owned, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a stylish and versatile addition to their home!
Results.Title: Love it!!!

Results.ReviewText: After months of searching, we finally found the perfect sofas! They are extremely comfortable, soft, and the quality is amazing! The cushions do not sink in. Although they do not have connectors, we haven't had any issues with them moving on the carpet. We are beyond happy with this purchase!
Results.Title: Buy the couch ... or two!!

Photos.Caption: Uneven pillow density; wrinkling; seam sagging.

Results.ReviewText: I really wanted to love this modular sofa, but it was not a good fit for my home. All the cushions are unattached, and with little effort, they move about and soon the overall look is quite disheveled. The seat back support is low and the cushions are very soft which contributed to poor posture and back support. The seating is quite deep and is more for relaxed lounging. Some structural issues with the manufacturing including varying densities of down in the cushion top made for some cushions appearing plump while another is wrinkled. In less than 2 weeks the seams started to relax giving an uneven appearance in the furniture lines. Costco's delivery service was seamless and so was the return process.
Results.Title: Not what I had hoped

Results.ReviewText: Purchased this sectional to replace an older sleeper sofa I had for years that was showing a lot of wear and tear. Only had to wait 7 days in between placing my order online and the sectional showing up at my door. Setup and delivery was included, and the two gentlemen that helped unbox everything had the sectional set up and all trash removed within 15 minutes or so, so thumbs up for a super fast delivery and setup! The sectional itself feels great and looks great in my apartment. At the time of this review, given the price and comfort it affords, this sectional is outstanding value, and I would wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone.
Results.Title: Fantastic sectional for great price

Results.ReviewText: Impressive. I’ve never been able to fall asleep on a couch but this one feels like a waterbed, pillow soft but snug and strong! Bonus- Beautiful modern, clean-cozy look too! Lightweight but strong. Only 4 days into it so…unsure if I love the material on my bare skin but overall sofa is very comfortable and fits my living room/office space perfectly!
Results.Title: Lightweight but strong, cozy-clean-comfort!

Results.ReviewText:
There were only 6 reviews on this couch when I made this purchase and I definitely don’t regret it! For reference, I’ve had the couch for about 3 weeks now. PROs: It’s so cozy and more plush than I thought it would be. The woven fabric doesn’t bother me— I actually love it! Seat dimensions are perfect for sitting cross legged (5’5”) and just for bumming around. If you’re on the fence & this is on sale, get it!!! CONs: I’d say that the biggest con is that there is nothing to attach the modular pieces together. However, I HIGHLY recommend getting Slipstick Gorilla Pads and sticking them to the feet of the couch. The pads completely stopped the sections from sliding around on my low-pile rug, but I’m not sure how effective it’ll be if you have young kids/pets jumping on it.

**Delivery guys were friendly but I’d advise to watch them carefully while they’re unpacking. They ripped the black bottom fabric of my couch where the legs were originally stored in.**

ClientResponses.Response: We noticed your comments about the sectional pieces coming apart to easily and wanted to share that the customer service center for Aiden & Ivy now stocks replacement legs that have a better non-skid surface. You may want to contact them for a set of these, free-of-charge, of course, at aidenandivyservice@serveco.com. We hope this resolves the issue for you. Thank you for your Costco membership!

Results.ReviewText: Decided I wanted a modular coach and this one is super comfy and versatile. I would have lived it to be darker but still fits my color scheme. Plan to use it as a sleeper when I have guests.  I do wish they included something to hold the pieces together and Velcro to keep the ottoman cushion in place.
Results.Title: Super Comfy and Versatile

4000310896.Name: Dayna 4-piece Fabric Modular Sectional
